jump_scares.spoiler: The screen quickly cuts from a quote to a ghost woman
A television screen begins to glitch out, followed by an immediate zoom on the screen as it shifts into a screaming ghost
A ghost flashes on the TV screen
As Abe steps outside, a man on a bike quickly rides past him
The boy’s face suddenly shifts accompanied by a loud sound effect
Abe approaches a dark hallway with a baseball bat and a ghost jumps out right at the camera
Abe carves on wood with a small knife and the screen suddenly flashes white with a loud sound
The girl on the bridge turns around to leave and runs into a man
Abe turns towards an elevator door and there is an immediate cut to a ghost woman jumping at the camera
A masked assailant suddenly tackles Sherry from the side
The scene once again flashes and shows a ghost while Abe carves on wood
A hand suddenly hits the car window when Abe’s wife turns back to the wheel
A ghost appears from behind Abe as he walks backwards
The screen suddenly cuts from some ghosts standing still to them screaming and reaching out at the camera
As the guy from the bridge twitches in his sleep, his face with blood on it flashes on the screen
In a dream sequence, the girl on the bridge’s face suddenly shifts into that of a ghost and the camera quickly zooms on her
Some images suddenly flash across the screen
A sudden cut to the computer screen accompanied by a flash and sound effect might be startling for some viewers
Abe drops his phone on the car floor and picks it up. As he leans back up, a ghost jumps at the car window
The ghost of the man on the bike suddenly appears on the road
A ghost child in a red raincoat appears and runs in the background
Abe looks to his side and there is a cut to the ghost child running across the room
There is a sudden white flash and cut with a bang sound
The camera cuts to some ghosts in the room
